amendment.description: To strike a provision relating to hemp.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3070 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3070 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 3411.
